page.title: 04RYSHWORTH MID. SCHOOL (Cont)
page.content:
hall,the library,the science/Home economics/craft area and the kitchens. The school has good playing fields and has facilities for many sports such as:NETBALL,FOOTBALL,RUGBY,HOCKEY, CRICKET,ROUNDERS AND ATHLETICS. Ryshworth has around 340 pupils and 16 teachers.The subjects taught at this school are :{ {Maths,English,French,Integrated} {Studies,Religious,Sexual and Pyshical {Education,Science,Cookery,Graphic {Arts,Heavy Craft,and Drama.
BY KATIE ATKINSON, APRIL BRETT, PIPPA OLDFIELD.
